title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud to AI Securing the New Cloud Attack Surface (SEC220)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云到AI：保护新的云攻击面 (SEC220)
abstract:
Everything we learned from running 20% of the internet-yours by default. Go from idea to production readiness instantly.
Join David Liu (AI specialist) as he reveals how Cloudflare's developer platform eliminates infrastructure provisioning and management for developers.  How Cloudflare has both stateful and ephemeral compute specifically designed to run your AI agents. Discover how the platform's intelligent auto-scaling handles traffic spikes and failures, ensuring you only pay for actual compute time and not wait time.
Learn how companies are deploying once and running their applications better than anybody else on Cloudflare's globally distributed serverless platform. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudflare, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn:
从运行互联网20%流量中学到的一切——默认属于您。从想法到生产就绪，瞬间实现。

加入David Liu（AI专家），了解Cloudflare开发者平台如何为开发者消除基础设施配置和管理。Cloudflare如何提供专为运行AI代理而设计的有状态和临时计算。了解平台的智能自动扩展如何处理流量峰值和故障，确保您只为实际计算时间付费，而非等待时间。

了解公司如何在Cloudflare全球分布式无服务器平台上一次部署，比任何人都更好地运行应用程序。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudflare为您呈现。
